lines.text: Tell me, what's a rich girl like you doing in a shit place like Alabama?
Oh, watching poor niggers break their asses in our father's cotton mill.
Well, listening to rock. You like rock?
Cannibals. Instead of buying frozen meat in the supermarket, they get theirs fresh from people like you. One way to solve the problem of starvation in the world.
Is this any time for wisecracks?
Their idea of lunch is fresh, hot entrails soaked in blood.
